title: LoL why I hate I yi players
body: Look at my last game yi was fed and we had better team fight then he says he wants to surrender we don't so he decides to farm and give them baron for free XD like wtf we were stronger at this point with better cc and team comp all they had was a fed zed and he just gives up saying we all suck and stuff

replies.body: Yeah, only people who play Yi do that.
People who played mf used to do that too ^^, that was like 2 years ago though

Well other than Yi players, Fiora players have the tendency to do that too for whatever reason, since they were designed alike I guess.

But as a Yi main myself, used to since I quitted a little while ago, I am not like those people aye.
